content.rendered:
Peach Aviation , operating under the brand name Peach is a low-cost airline based in Japan. Peach was formed in February 2011. Its head office is on the fifth floor of Kensetsu-to on the property of Kansai International Airport in Izumisano, Osaka Prefecture. Peach has hubs at Kansai International Airport in Osaka and at Naha Airport in Okinawa. In the spring of 2015, the airline planned to open a third hub at Narita International Airport in order to serve the Greater Tokyo Area.

Peach Airlines in Tajiri, Japan Contact Address, Phone, Email, Working hours and Website

Address: Kansai International Airport, Tajiri, Japan

Phone number:  NA

FAX: NA

Email ID: NA

Opening hours: NA

Peach Airlines Official website: https://www.flypeach.com/en

Peach Airlines Online Check-in: www.flypeach.com/lm/ai/airports

Note: Check-in for domestic flights must be completed 30 minutes before departure time.
Check-in for international flights must be completed 50 minutes before departure time.

Check Peach Airlines schedule here: www.flypeach.com/en/lm/st/schedules

Check Peach Airlines flight status here: www.flypeach.com/lm/flightstatus

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Peach Airlines

Total fleet: 34

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A320neo
  • Airbus A321LR

Peach Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Peach Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Peach Airlines

Traveling while Pregnant in Peach Airlines

  • If you are pregnant and expecting delivery within 28 days, It is required to submit a medical form in advance.
  • If you are pregnant and expecting delivery in more than 29 days, you do not have to submit a medical form before traveling.

For more details: https://www.flypeach.com/en/lm/ai/airports/special_support/pregnant

Traveling with Pets in Peach Airlines

  • Pets are not allowed to travel in Peach Airlines.

Queries handled by Peach Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Peach Airlines in Tajiri, Japan Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Peach Airlines in Tajiri, Japan: (click on the stars below)
